The Infrastructure of Truth

From raw API data to verifiable on-chain outcomes. TaaS handles the complexity of decentralized consensus automatically.

Truth Request

Dev defines a TaaS Recipe via SDK. Multi-step logic specifies exactly how truth should be fetched and computed.

Payload Data
{
  "source": "NBA_API_V3",
  "logic": "HomeScore > AwayScore",
  "disputeWindow": "24h"
}

Recipe Execution

Nodes execute the sandboxed JS/Math logic. Data is fetched from multiple sources and aggregated off-chain.

Payload Data
{
  "steps": [
    "fetch",
    "math",
    "aggregate"
  ],
  "strategy": "median"
}

Network Consensus

Sentinel nodes verify the execution trace and sign an EIP-712 attestation. Multi-sig security ensures integrity.

Payload Data
{
  "sentinels": 5,
  "threshold": 3,
  "status": "signed"
}

On-Chain Settlement

Verified truth is pushed to the Helios blockchain. The Prediction Market or Dapp resolves with absolute finality.

Payload Data
{
  "contract": "TruthOracleV2",
  "method": "proposeRichOutcome",
  "tx": "0x8f...3a2b"
}
Developer First

Truth should be a
Primitive, not a Service.

TaaS abstracts away the complexity of decentralized consensus. Request data from any API, and our network specific guardians will verify integrity before it ever touches your smart contract.

240ms
Latency
100%
Uptime
taas-cli — v2.4.0
$taas request --source "ETH/USD" --min-reputation 0.9
> Request initialized: 0x8f...3a2b
$Searching for validators...
$Verifying data integrity...
$Executing on-chain callback...

Processing Data Stream

Truth is Programmable.

Most oracles only return simple numbers. TaaS supports complex, structured outcome types that power the next generation of predictive applications—from deep insurance to AI content verification.

Any REST API or On-chain Source
Decentralized Multi-Step Pipelines
Scalar
Market Price / Weather
ETH/USD: $3,450.25 (±0.01)
Categorical
Sports / Elections
Winner: Manchester City
Probabilistic
AI Confidence / Risk
Success Probability: 94.2%
Invalid
Subjective Questions
Refused: Question Ambiguous
